text: Following up, I was essentially told this is a non-standard implementation and not supported by HubSpot. The tracking code cannot be removed "as there is no reason to do so" per support. Looking into alternate ways of handing this now and trying to solve the problems ourselves.

Has anyone else attempted to use a third party cookie consent platform on their HubSpot hosted website? I know HubSpot has built in functionality for this but we have to use this third party solution. At this point I just need to know if it is possible. So far I'm getting that it is not.
